name: Quest for Zhu
description:
Come along with Pipsqueak, Mr. Squiggles, Num Nums and Chunk on their quest to find the magical Palace of Zhu!

Features

• Explore 16 exciting locations from the Snow Mountains to the Amazhu Jungle!
• Play 4 exciting mini-games including Vine Swinging and Snowball Throw.
• Collect coins, tokens and hidden Zhus to help you unlock new items!
• Watch thrilling cut scenes from the movie!
